txt.en: You are defeated and retreating to the horse-fields!

The sounds and smell of war would scare away most horses, but you are drawn to it like a moth to a flame. You seek an audience with a horse that is accustomed to conflict in hope that it may shed some light on your purpose....

'What brought you to a place like this? This is not a place for any creature in his right mind, for I am on the edge of war, with the smoke of many fires filling the air.

'The Enemy has turned his attention to steeds of late; he uses traps to tear or break our legs. These wicked mechanisms must be destroyed, but be careful, for they will likely be guarded. Once a steed is snared, enemies try to ambush the rider before the horse can break free.

'You look like you can handle yourself better than most horses I have ever seen. Please help us destroy the horse-traps and their makers!'

You are drawn to Esteldín by a notion of some conflict there, and you feel connected to that purpose somehow. You seek a horse that can inform you about the tactics and strategies of war as a steed.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If defeated or time expires, you will return to Hengstacer Farm.</rgb>

'The Rangers here, and we steeds especially, thank you for destroying the traps that our enemies laid for us. You have had a taste of war, and it looks as though it did not break your spirit. You are made of strong stuff, friend...and I hope to see you again before long.'
Terrible horse-traps are being used by the enemy and can be found in the passes toward Dol Dínen.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If defeated or time expires, you will return to Hengstacer Farm.</rgb>
The Ranger's horse can be found back in Esteldín.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If defeated or time expires, you will return to Hengstacer Farm.</rgb>
Find a Ranger's horse in Esteldín
Talk to the Ranger's horse at Esteldín
